<script type="text/babel">
    const ProgressBar = ({ language, percentage }) => {
        const colorMap = {
            'R': 'bg-[#E25822]',
            'Python': 'bg-[#F27B50]',
            'TypeScript': 'bg-[#FF6347]',
            'SQL': 'bg-[#FF4500]',
            'NoSQL': 'bg-[#FF7F50]',
            'KQL': 'bg-[#FF6347]',
            'React.js': 'bg-[#FF8C69]',
            'Scikit-Learn': 'bg-[#E25822]',
            'TensorFlow': 'bg-[#F27B50]',
            'Elastic Search': 'bg-[#FF4500]',
            'Azure Search Ai': 'bg-[#FF6347]',
            'Cosmos DB': 'bg-[#FF8C69]',
            'SPSS Modeler': 'bg-[#E25822]',
            'Orange': 'bg-[#F27B50]',
        };

        return (
            <div className="mb-2">
                <div className="flex justify-between text-sm mb-1">
                    <span>{language}</span>
                    <span>{percentage}%</span>
                </div>
                <div className="w-full bg-gray-200 rounded-full h-2.5">
                    <div 
                        className={`${colorMap[language]} h-2.5 rounded-full`} 
                        style={{width: `${percentage}%`}}
                    ></div>
                </div>
            </div>
        );
    };

    const App = () => {
        const [showMoreAbout, setShowMoreAbout] = React.useState(false);

        return (
            <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto space-y-6">
                <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-6">
                    {/* Welcome Card */}
                    <div className="bg-[#F8F9FA] text-black p-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg">
                        <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold mb-4">Welcome!</h2>
                        <p>This space started as my personal notebook. But, in time, it has turned out to be my blog where I share ideas, tutorials, and projects using R to tackle educational challenges.</p>
                        <p>I'm passionate about combining Data Science, Psychometrics, and Data Analytics with the fascinating field of Educational Assessment.</p>
                        <p>Always feel free to contact me about any feedback, questions, or maybe just to say “hi”.</p>
                    </div>

                    {/* Content Description Card */}
                    <div className="bg-[#F8F9FA] text-black p-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg">
                        <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold mb-4">What You Will Find Here</h2>
                        <ul className="list-disc list-inside space-y-2">
                            <li>R programming for data analysis and visualization</li>
                            <li>Psychometrics and educational assessment techniques</li>
                            <li>Machine learning and AI applications in education</li>
                            <li>Explorations of NLP and LLMs in educational research</li>
                            <li>Several applications that I developed for fun and learning</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                </div>

                {/* More About Me Button */}
                {!showMoreAbout && (
                    <div className="text-center">
                        <button 
                            onClick={() => setShowMoreAbout(true)}
                            className="bg-[#E25822] hover:bg-[#FF4500] text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded-full transition duration-300"
                        >
                            More About Me
                        </button>
                    </div>
                )}

                {/* More About Me Cards */}
                {showMoreAbout && (
                    <div className="space-y-6">
                        <div className="bg-[#F8F9FA] text-black p-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg">
                            <h3 className="text-xl font-bold mb-3">Educational Background</h3>
                            <ul className="space-y-2">
                                <li>
                                    <strong>Ph.D. Candidate</strong><br />
                                    Gazi University, Department of Educational Assessment and Evaluation (2022-ongoing)
                                </li>
                                <li>
                                    <strong>Master's Degree</strong><br />
                                    Ankara University, Assessment and Evaluation in Education (2016-2020)
                                </li>
                                <li>
                                    <strong>Bachelor's Degree</strong><br />
                                    Gazi University, Foreign Language Education (2008-2014)
                                </li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>

                        <div className="bg-[#F8F9FA] text-black p-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg">
                            <h3 className="text-xl font-bold mb-3">My Interests</h3>
                            <p>I am passionate about learning and exploring new ideas in the fields of Data Science, Psychometrics, Data Analytics, and Educational Assessment. My current research interest is mostly on NLP, ML, AES, AI, and LLMs.</p>
                        </div>

                        <div className="bg-[#F8F9FA] text-black p-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg">
                            <h3 className="text-xl font-bold mb-3">1000-Hour Challenge</h3>
                            <p className="mb-4">I'm tracking my mastery in languages and tools with a goal of reaching 1000 hours in each.</p> 
                            <p>Here's my current progress:</p>
                            <div className="space-y-2">
                                <ProgressBar language="R" percentage={100} />
                                <ProgressBar language="Python" percentage={100} />
                                <ProgressBar language="Scikit-Learn" percentage={40} />
                                <ProgressBar language="TensorFlow" percentage={50} />
                                <ProgressBar language="TypeScript" percentage={100} />
                                <ProgressBar language="SQL" percentage={100} />
                                <ProgressBar language="NoSQL" percentage={50} />
                                <ProgressBar language="KQL" percentage={80} />
                                <ProgressBar language="React.js" percentage={20} />
                                <ProgressBar language="Elastic Search" percentage={10} />
                                <ProgressBar language="Azure Search Ai" percentage={40} />
                                <ProgressBar language="Cosmos DB" percentage={80} />
                                <ProgressBar language="SPSS Modeler" percentage={35} />
                                <ProgressBar language="Orange" percentage={1} />
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                )}
            </div>
        );
    };

    ReactDOM.render(<App />, document.getElementById('root'));
    </script>
